name: Synthwave Save
description:
Synthwave Save by Sam Harris, First Game Jam That I've Done. Try to defend yourself from missiles. There is no increasing difficulty so 1 min is same as 30 min game play wise.

Controls:

You cant move 

left mouse to shoot

Credits:

Song "Falling into the Game" by Monplaisir 

http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Soft_and_Furious/
